name: Novotel Cannes Montfleury

reviews.text: There are positives and there are negatives.
reviews.title: There are positives and there are negatives

reviews.text: the room was fit for a king with a balcony, plasma tv and a giant bath tub. but it took us hours to get it with people at the front desk being arrogant telling us we had cancelled even though the was a no cancel policy. we showed them thier own terms and conditions but they just shrugged telling us that we could not use the internet properly . In the end they took 3 hours telling us they would take only 20 mins. we were not on our own though.
reviews.title: snooty staff
Good hotel in Cannes!
reviews.text: the pool was very nice. but sun beds cost 8 euros which is around 5 gb pounds and 10 us dollars. and lunch was expensive so unless your a millionaire, take a 2 walk to get into town and spend less money by getting a 3 course meal!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However I do like this hotel and if i had to go again, I'd bring more cash with me- alot more cash with me !
reviews.title: Nice hotel, poor location

description: The traditional juxtaposed with the modern ! In the heart of this legendary town, located in a peaceful park just ten minutes on foot from the Croisette and close to the town centre and the beaches, you will find the Novotel Cannes Montfleury. A four star hotel which offers you a harmonious interior decor and a warm welcome.Discover the calm atmosphere of our 182 bedrooms. Remove the stress of worrying about organising your professional business events.
